response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This represents a significant savings compared to its market value of $12,000, while still allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of its cost to my business. I trust this offer will be favorable and look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations.", "product_price": 9500}
